task: Explore the DeckPicker page to understand available deck options.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when fufu has interacted with different deck options on the DeckPicker page.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has content_desc "Home"
Touch on a button that has content_desc "Deck Search"

By touching the "Deck Search" button, the "Deck Search" button is replaced with a "Collapse" button, and a textfield for searching using deck name is now focused on the screen in the SharedDecks interface.
Fill a focused textfield that has text "Search using deck name" with "Computer Science Flashcards"

The text in the focused textfield on the SharedDecks screen has been changed from "Search using deck name" to "Computer Science Flashcards" after filling it with the new search query. Additionally, a new button with the content description "Clear query" has appeared on the screen.
Touch on a button that has content_desc "Clear query"
By touching the "Clear query" button, the text in the focused text field changed from "Computer Science Flashcards" to "Search using deck name," allowing the user to easily input a new search query.
Scroll down on a focused scrollable area

The actions taken by fufu so far seem okay in exploring the DeckPicker page, but there hasn't been direct interaction with different deck options yet. fufu needs to explore the available deck options by interacting with them directly on the DeckPicker page to understand the variety of decks offered.
Scroll down on a focused scrollable area
Touch on a button that has content_desc "Collapse"
The button with content_desc "Collapse" has been replaced by a button with content_desc "Navigate up" in the current screen, along with the addition of a "Download deck" textview.
Touch on a button that has content_desc "Navigate up"

By touching the "Navigate up" button, the screen transitioned from the "SharedDecks" page to the "DeckPicker" page, where the layout and available options have changed significantly, including the addition of options like "Open drawer" and "More options." (page changed from SharedDecks to DeckPicker)
Touch on a button that has text "Computer Science Flashcards, 0, 0[...and more]"

By touching on the "Computer Science Flashcards" button, the screen now displays a message indicating that the deck is empty with an "Add" button, suggesting that the deck currently selected does not have any flashcards.
